name: Art II
description: Test your expertise in art history, techniques, and famous artists.

questions.description: Who painted the iconic artwork 'The Persistence of Memory' featuring melting clocks?
Which art movement is characterized by dreamlike, irrational, and fantastical imagery?
What technique involves scratching the surface layer of a painting to reveal underlying colors?
Which artist is famous for his colorful depictions of Tahiti and the South Pacific?
What is the term for a painting that depicts inanimate objects, often arranged on a table?
Which Italian Renaissance artist painted 'The Birth of Venus'?
What is the name of the famous Dutch painter known for his detailed, realistic still lifes?
Which color is associated with the Impressionist movement?
What is the Japanese art of paper folding called?
Who painted 'Girl with a Pearl Earring'?
